blogPost.excerpt: It is very simple and minimalist, but it works. This is a widget application that displays actions to be taken right now. Recommended for smartphone addicts. It is a tool for productivity, but I recommend writing down what you need to do right now.
blogPost.body: It is very simple and minimalist, but it works. This is a widget application that displays actions to be taken right now. Recommended for smartphone addicts. It is a tool for productivity, but I recommend writing down what you need to do right now.
blogPost.title: Wyd? - An iOS widget to encourage you to do one thing
blogPost.author: Notty

localize.description: 它非常简单和简约，但它工作。这是一个显示现在要采取的行动的小部件应用程序。推荐给智能手机上瘾者。它是一个生产力的工具，但我建议写下你现在需要做的事情。
localize.tagline: 一个鼓励你做一件事的iOS小工具

localize.description: 它非常簡單和簡約，但它工作。這是一個顯示現在要採取的行動的小部件應用程序。推薦給智能手機上癮者。它是一個生產力的工具，但我建議寫下你現在需要做的事情。
localize.tagline: 一個鼓勵你做一件事的iOS小工具

previous.excerpt: Free medicine 3d icons pack for you project which you can easily customise with Figma or Sketch. - 21 unique icons - Hi-res images - Compatible with Figma and Sketch - Everything clear, grouped and easy to use - Instructions included
previous.title: Faticons COVID pack - Free, widely usable and customizable low-poly 3D icons

localize.description: 免费的医学3D图标包，你可以很容易地用Figma或Sketch自定义你的项目。- 21个独特的图标 - 高分辨率图像 - 兼容Figma和Sketch - 一切都很清楚，分组和易于使用 - 包括说明。
localize.tagline: 免费的、可广泛使用的、可定制的低聚3D图标。

localize.description: 免費的醫學3D圖標包，你可以很容易地用Figma或Sketch自定義你的項目。- 21個獨特的圖標 - 高分辨率圖像 - 兼容Figma和Sketch - 一切都很清楚，分組和易於使用 - 包括說明。
localize.tagline: 免費的、可廣泛使用的、可定製的低聚3D圖標。

next.excerpt: The very first all-in-one Clubhouse management platform: The MVP version of Direcon is designed to solve the urgent problems of people who moderate rooms on Clubhouse like lack of insights about their rooms and limited moderation options.
next.title: Direcon for Clubhouse - All-in-one Clubhouse management platform

localize.description: 第一款一体化的Clubhouse管理平台。MVP版的Direcon是为了解决在Clubhouse上管理房间的人的迫切问题 比如缺乏对房间的了解和有限的管理选择。
第一款一體化的Clubhouse管理平臺。MVP版的Direcon是爲了解決在Clubhouse上管理房間的人的迫切問題 比如缺乏對房間的瞭解和有限的管理選擇。
